name: Bouncy Samurai - Tap to Make Him Bounce, Fight Time and Don't Touch the Ninja Shadow Spikes
name_original: Bouncy Samurai - Tap to Make Him Bounce, Fight Time and Don't Touch the Ninja Shadow Spikes
description:
Bouncy Samurai is super easy to play and will give you hours of bouncing excitement!

Tap the screen to make the samurai dude bounce left and right. Watch out for spikes!

Have fun, and turn up the volume :)

Features
- Fun sound effects
- Challenging
- Highly addictive
- One-tap gameplay
- Endless gameplay
- Hours of bouncing excitement
- Game center

search "Tardent" on the App Store for more great apps and games.
